mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(QBOARD_NO) FROM QUESTION_BOARD
SELECT COUNT(FBOARD_NO) FROM FREE_BOARD
WHERE 1 = 1
AND (USER_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%')
AND BOARD_ADOPT = #{boardAdopt}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, B.* from
(SELECT * FROM QUESTION_BOARD
(SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD
WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( USER_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%')
AND BOARD_ADOPT = #{boardAdopt}
ORDER BY ${ordering} DESC) B) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, USER_ID, BOARD_NO, GRADE, COMMENT_CONTENT) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(COMMENT_NO),0) + 1 FROM BOARD_COMMENT), #{userId}, #{boardNo}, #{grade}, #{commentContent})

select.if: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT QAC.*, QA.BOARD_NO QBOARD_NO FROM QUESTION_ANSWER_COMMENT QAC, QUESTION_ANSWER QA WHERE QAC.COMMENT_NO = QA.COMMENT_NO ORDER BY COMMENT2_REGDATE ASC) WHERE QBOARD_NO = #{qboardNo}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BCC.*, BC.BOARD_NO FBOARD_NO FROM BOARD_COMMENT BC, BOARD_COMMENT2 BCC WHERE BC.COMMENT_NO = BCC.COMMENT_NO ORDER BY COMMENT2_REGDATE ASC) WHERE FBOARD_NO = #{fboardNo}
